dooyit.storage

Class TaskLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • dooyit.storage.Loader<TaskData>
      • dooyit.storage.TaskLoader

  • public class TaskLoader
extends Loader<TaskData>
    The TaskLoader class contains methods and attributes necessary for loading tasks.

    Dex
